DESCRIPTION: An #yUnplayable card that may be attached to a card by right clicking and then choosing a card in your hand. May have requirements for attachment.
An #yUnplayable card that is unfinished. May be converted into a playable card by right clicking and then choosing an appropriate amount of cards in your hand to #yExhaust.
At the beginning of your next turn, add the selected cards to your hand. Will not recover cards which are exhausted or otherwise removed from play.
When out of charges, you may Right Click to spend [E] to restore all charges. Will automatically recharge for free if drawn twice while empty.
When out of ammo, you may Right Click to spend [E] to restore all ammo. Will automatically reload for free if drawn twice while empty.
Increase the amount of #yRepairable #yArmor. Cannot surpass its maximum capacity.
At the end of your turn, gain #yBlock. Can be repaired up to its maximum capacity.
Right Click to swap the effect of this card.
This card returns to your hand when played.
An #yUnplayable card that has effects active while equipped. May be equipped by right clicking if you have an open slot.
This card can right clicked in-hand to cycle its cost and effect.
